welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Flero, Italy! Get ready to experience the charming atmosphere of our city, known for its beautiful landscapes, rich history, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Flero has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brescia Montichiari Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for general aviation and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bergamo - Orio al Serio Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bergamo - Orio al Serio Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a registration process.
